== Bio ==
David Simonsen is head of WAYF - Where Are You From, a Danish,
publicly funded eID federation.

He was previously member of the governments IT advisory board and has
for more than a decade worked with federated infrastructures like
<a href="http://www.eduroam.org">www.eduroam.org</a> (international
academic wifi-roaming) and eID federations, also internationally.
David is member of the steering committee for
<a href="http://www.kalmar2.org">www.kalmar2.org</a> (inter-federation
effort) and active in a handful of other fora.
